description: This file defines a Python class SerpApiTools that provides methods to perform Google and YouTube searches using the SerpAPI service. It includes functionality for initializing with API keys, performing searches, and returning results in JSON format.

classes.name: SerpApiTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for performing Google and YouTube searches via SerpAPI.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the SerpApiTools with optional API key and search options.

methods.name: search_google
methods.description: Performs a Google search using SerpAPI and returns the results as a JSON string.

methods.name: search_youtube
methods.description: Performs a YouTube search using SerpAPI and returns the results as a JSON string.
